Paragraph: The party , led by the vigorously-confident Klaus , took 32 of 81 seats after late November runoff elections to the new upper house of Czech parliament .

The entity "Czech parliament" is not a valid organization in this context, as it is not a separate entity but rather a part of the government. The word "party" refers to a political organization, and therefore it is a valid entity in this context.
